channel.title: 飞书 on nayun blog
channel.description: Recent content in 飞书 on nayun blog

item.title: 自定义类
item.description:
自定义飞书块类
#

</> python 
  1class block:
  2    '''一个block为一行
  3
  4        :param content:
  5            str:{content:None}
  6            dict:{content:style}
  7        :param blocktype:
  8            2：文本 Block
  9            3：标题 1 Block
 10            4：标题 2 Block
 11            5：标题 3 Block
 12            6：标题 4 Block
 13            7：标题 5 Block
 14            8：标题 6 Block
 15            13：有序列表 Block
 16            27：image Block
 17            ...
 18            参考:https://open.feishu.cn/document/server-docs/docs/docs/docx-v1/document-block/create#1b8abd5d
 19        :param indent:
 20            首行缩进级别。仅支持对 Text 块进行修改，其余类型不生效。
 21            示例值："NoIndent"
 22            可选值有：
 23                NoIndent：无缩进
 24                OneLevelIndent：一级缩进
 25
 26        :param align:
 27            对齐方式
 28            1：居左排版
 29            2：居中排版
 30            3：居右排版
 31            默认值：1
 32
 33        :param background_color
 34            LightGrayBackground：浅灰色
 35            LightRedBackground：浅红色
 36            LightOrangeBackground：浅橙色
 37            LightYellowBackground：浅黄色
 38            LightGreenBackground：浅绿色
 39            LightBlueBackground：浅蓝色
 40            LightPurpleBackground：浅紫色
 41            PaleGrayBackground：中灰色
 42            DarkGrayBackground：灰色
 43            DarkRedBackground：中红色
 44            DarkOrangeBackground：中橙色
 45            DarkYellowBackground：中黄色
 46            DarkGreenBackground：中绿色
 47            DarkBlueBackground：中蓝色
 48            DarkPurpleBackground：中紫色
 49    '''
 50    class Content:
 51        '''
 52        Text Content自定义样式支持：
 53            bold
 54                示例值：true
 55                默认值：false
 56
 57            italic
 58                示例值：true
 59                默认值：false
 60
 61            strikethrough 删除线
 62                示例值：true
 63                默认值：false
 64
 65            underline 下划线
 66                示例值：true
 67                默认值：false
 68
 69            inline_code inline代码
 70                示例值：true
 71                默认值：false
 72
 73            background_color 背景色
 74                可选值有：
 75                1：浅红色
 76                2：浅橙色
 77                3：浅黄色
 78                4：浅绿色
 79                5：浅蓝色
 80                6：浅紫色
 81                7：中灰色
 82                8：红色
 83                9：橙色
 84                10：黄色
 85                11：绿色
 86                12：蓝色
 87                13：紫色
 88                14：灰色
 89                15：浅灰色
 90
 91            text_color 字体颜色
 92                可选值有：
 93                1：红色
 94                2：橙色
 95                3：黄色
 96                4：绿色
 97                5：蓝色
 98
 99            link 链接
100                url 超链接指向的 url (需要 url_encode)
101                    示例值："https%3A%2F%2Fopen.feishu.cn%2F"
102        '''
103        def __init__(self, content) -> None:
104            if isinstance(content, dict):
105                self.contents = {
106                    c:style
107                    for c, style in content.items()
108                }
109            else:
110                self.contents = {str(content):{}}
111        
112        def __iter__(self):
113            return iter(self.contents.items())
114        
115        def __contains__(self, k):
116            return k in self.contents
117
118    def __init__(self, content, blocktype=2, indent='NoIndent', align=1, background_color=None) -> None:
119        self.type = blocktype
120        self.indent = indent
121        self.align = align
122        self.background_color = background_color
123        self.content = None
124        if blocktype != 27 and content!= None:
125            self.content = self.Content(content)
126    
127    __doc__ = __doc__ + Content.__doc__

自定义飞书请求异常类
#

</> python 
 1class LarkException(Exception):
 2    def __init__(self, code=0, msg=None):
 3        self.code = code
 4        self.msg = msg
 5
 6    def __str__(self) -> str:
 7        return "{}:{}".format(self.code, self.msg)
 8
 9    __repr__ = __str__
10
11
12def request(method, url, headers, payload=None, data=None, retry=6, timeout=None, rcode=0):
13    e = None
14    err_resp = None
15    resp = {}
16    while retry:
17        try:
18            response = requests.request(method, url, headers=headers, json=payload, data=data, timeout=timeout)
19            try:
20                resp = response.json()
21            except:
22                pass
23            code = resp.get("code", None)
24            if code == -1:
25                code = resp.get("StatusCode", -1)
26            if code == -1 and response.status_code != 200:
27                response.raise_for_status()
28            if code != None and code != rcode:
29                raise LarkException(code=code, msg=resp.get("msg", ""))
30            break
31        except KeyboardInterrupt:
32            print('\n停止')
33            raise KeyboardInterrupt
34        except:
35            print(f'request retry {retry}...')
36            e = traceback.format_exc()
37            err_resp = resp
38            retry -= 1
39            time.sleep(0.1)
40    else:
41        raise requests.RequestException(str(e)+str(err_resp))
42    
43    return resp

自定义飞书client请求方法类
#

</> python 
  1class Client(object):
  2    APP_ID = ''
  3    APP_SECRET = ''
  4    LARK_HOST = 'https://open.feishu.cn/'
  5
  6    def __init__(self):
  7        self._host = self.LARK_HOST
  8        self.token = self.get_tenant_access_token()
  9
 10    def get_tenant_access_token(self):
 11        url = self._host + "/open-apis/auth/v3/app_access_token/internal/"
 12        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'}
 13        payload = {'app_id': self.APP_ID, 'app_secret': self.APP_SECRET}
 14        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
 15        return resp['tenant_access_token']
 16
 17    ############################### DOCX API ######################################
 18    def createdocx(self, title, folder_token=None, access_token=None):
 19        '''
 20        :return:
 21            document id
 22        '''
 23        url = self._host + '/open-apis/docx/v1/documents'
 24        folder_token = '' if not folder_token else folder_token
 25        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 26        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 27        payload = {"title": title, "folder_token": folder_token}
 28        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
 29        return resp['data']['document']['document_id']
 30
 31    def fetchblocks(self, document_id, block_id=None, access_token=None):
 32        url1 = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks'
 33        url2 = self._host + f"/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children"
 34        url = url2 if block_id else url1
 35        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 36        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 37        resp = request("GET", url, headers)
 38        return resp
 39    
 40    def creategrid(self, document_id:str, col:int, access_token=None) -> list:
 41        '''
 42        创建分栏块，col: 2 ~ 5
 43        :return:
 44            children block list
 45        '''
 46        if col < 2:
 47            return document_id
 48        url = f'{self._host}/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{document_id}/children'
 49        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 50        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 51        payload = {
 52            "index": -1,
 53            "children": [
 54                {
 55                    "block_type": 24,
 56                    "grid": {
 57                        "column_size": 5 if col > 5 else col,
 58                    }
 59                }
 60            ]
 61        }
 62        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
 63        return resp['data']['children'][0]['children']
 64
 65    def createblocks(self, document_id:str, blocks, block_id:str=None, insert_index:int=-1, access_token=None) -> list:
 66        '''
 67        创建文本块
 68        
 69        block_type支持：
 70            - text(2)
 71            - heading1~6(3~8)
 72            - 列表(无序:12，有序:13)
 73            - 代码块(14)
 74            - 引用(15)
 75            - 代办(17)
 76
 77        :param blocks:
 78            block or block list
 79        :return:
 80            children block id list
 81        '''
 82        if not isinstance(blocks, list):
 83            blocks = [blocks]
 84        if not block_id:
 85            block_id = document_id
 86        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
 87        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 88        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 89        blockmap = {2: "text", 3: "heading1", 4: "heading2", 5: "heading3", 6: "heading4", 7: "heading5", 8: "heading6"
 90                    , 12: "bullet", 13:"ordered", 14:"code", 15:"quote", 17:"todo", 27:"image"}
 91        payload = {
 92            "index": insert_index,
 93            "children": [
 94                {
 95                    "block_type": block.type,
 96                    blockmap[block.type]: {
 97                        "style":{
 98                            "indentation_level": block.indent,
 99                            "align":block.align,
100                            "background_color":block.background_color,
101                        } if block.type == 2 else {},
102                        "elements": [
103                            {
104                                "text_run": {
105                                    "content": content,
106                                    "text_element_style": style
107                                },
108                            }
109                            for content, style in block.content
110                        ],
111                    } if block.content else {}
112                }
113                for block in blocks
114            ]
115        }
116        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
117
118        # 限制api请求频率
119        time.sleep(0.1)
120        childrenblocks = []
121        if resp['code'] == 0:
122            childrenblocks = [c['block_id'] for c in resp['data']['children']]
123        return childrenblocks
124    
125    def createsheet(self, document_id:str, row:int, col:int, 
126                   block_id:str=None, insert_index:int=-1, access_token=None) -> list:
127        '''
128        创建docx内置电子表格
129        :param merge coord:
130            合并坐标从下标1开始，比如第2行第2列到第3行第4列，start:(2, 2) end:(3, 4)
131        :return:
132            spreadsheet_token, sheet_id
133        '''
134        if row < 1 or col < 1:
135            return None
136        if not block_id:
137            block_id = document_id
138        url = f'{self._host}/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
139        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
140        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
141        extra_row = 0 if row < 10 else (row - 9)
142        extra_col = 0 if col < 10 else (col - 9)
143        payload = {
144            "index": insert_index,
145            "children": [
146                {
147                    "block_type": 30,
148                    "sheet": {
149                        "row_size": 9 if extra_row else row,
150                        "column_size": 9 if extra_col else col,
151                    }
152                }
153            ]
154        }
155        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
156        if None != (code:=resp.get('code', None)):
157            if code != 0: raise LarkException(resp['code'], resp['msg'])
158        else: 
159            print(resp)
160            return None
161        spreadsheet_token, sheet_id = resp['data']['children'][0]['sheet']['token'].split('_')
162        url =  f'{self._host}/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/dimension_range'
163        if extra_row:
164            payload = {
165                "dimension":{
166                    "sheetId":sheet_id,
167                    "majorDimension":'ROWS',
168                    "length":extra_row,
169                },
170            }
171            resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
172
173        if extra_col:
174            payload = {
175                "dimension":{
176                    "sheetId":sheet_id,
177                    "majorDimension":'COLUMNS',
178                    "length":extra_col,
179                },
180            }
181            resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
182    
183        return spreadsheet_token, sheet_id
184    
185    def createtable(self, document_id:str, row:int, col:int, 
186                   column_width:list=[],
187                   merge_start_coord:tuple=None,
188                   merge_end_coord:tuple=None,
189                   header_row:bool=False,
190                   header_column:bool=False,
191                   block_id:str=None, access_token=None) -> list:
192        '''
193        创建docx普通表格
194        :param merge coord:
195            合并坐标从下标1开始，比如第2行第2列到第3行第4列，start:(2, 2) end:(3, 4)
196        :return:
197            table_block_id, childrenblocks
198        '''
199        if row < 1 or col < 1:
200            return None
201        if not block_id:
202            block_id = document_id
203        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
204        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
205        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
206        extra_row = 0 if row < 10 else (row - 9)
207        extra_col = 0 if col < 10 else (col - 9)
208        payload = {
209            "index": -1,
210            "children": [
211                {
212                    "block_type": 31,
213                    "table": {
214                        "property": {
215                            "row_size": 9 if extra_row else row,
216                            "column_size": 9 if extra_col else col,
217                            "column_width": column_width,
218                            "header_row":header_row,
219                            "header_column":header_column,
220                        }
221                    }
222                }
223            ]
224        }
225        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
226        childrenblocks = []
227        if resp['code'] == 0:
228            childrenblocks = [c for c in resp['data']['children'][0]['children']]
229        table_id = resp['data']['children'][0]['block_id']
230
231        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{table_id}'
232        while extra_row:
233            payload = {
234                'insert_table_row':{
235                    "row_index": -1,
236                },
237            }
238            request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
239            extra_row -= 1
240            # 接口频率限制 3次/秒
241            time.sleep(0.34)
242
243        while extra_col:
244            payload = {
245                'insert_table_column':{
246                    "column_index": -1,
247                },
248            }
249            request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
250            extra_col -= 1
251            # 接口频率限制 3次/秒
252            time.sleep(0.34)
253
254        if not merge_start_coord or not merge_end_coord:
255            return table_id, childrenblocks
256        payload = {
257            'merge_table_cells':{
258                "row_start_index":merge_start_coord[0]-1,
259                "row_end_index":merge_end_coord[0],
260                "column_start_index":merge_start_coord[1]-1,
261                "column_end_index":merge_end_coord[1],
262            }
263        }
264        request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
265
266        return table_id, childrenblocks
267    
268    def merge_table_cell(self, document_id, table_id, merge_start_coord, merge_end_coord, access_token=None):
269        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{table_id}'
270        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
271        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
272        payload = {
273            'merge_table_cells':{
274                "row_start_index":merge_start_coord[0]-1,
275                "row_end_index":merge_end_coord[0],
276                "column_start_index":merge_start_coord[1]-1,
277                "column_end_index":merge_end_coord[1],
278            }
279        }
280        request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
281    
282    def updateblocktext(self, document_id:str, block_id:str, block:block, access_token=None):
283        '''
284        更新块文本
285        '''
286        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}'
287        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
288        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
289        payload = {
290            'update_text' if block.content != None else 'update_text_style':{
291                "style":{
292                    "indentation_level": block.indent,
293                    "align":block.align,
294                    "background_color":block.background_color,
295                },
296                "elements": [
297                    {
298                        "text_run": {
299                            "content": content,
300                            "text_element_style": style
301                        },
302                    }
303                    for content, style in block.content
304                ] if block.content != None else None,
305                "fields":[1, 7] + ([6] if block.background_color else []),
306            },
307        }
308        request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
309        # 限制api请求频率
310        time.sleep(0.1)
311        return
312    
313    def createcallout(self, document_id:str, background_color=2, border_color=2, text_color=None, emoji='bust_in_silhouette', block_id:str=None, insert_index:int=-1, access_token=None) -> list:
314        '''
315        创建高亮块
316        return:
317            blockid, child_id
318        
319        background_color:
320            1：浅红色
321            2：浅橙色
322            3：浅黄色
323            4：浅绿色
324            5：浅蓝色
325            6：浅紫色
326            7：中灰色
327            8：中红色
328            9：中橙色
329            10：中黄色
330            11：中绿色
331            12：中蓝色
332            13：中紫色
333            14：灰色
334            15：浅灰色
335
336        border_color/test_color:
337            1：红色
338            2：橙色
339            3：黄色
340            4：绿色
341            5：蓝色
342            6：紫色
343            7：灰色
344
345        高亮块emoji参考：https://open.feishu.cn/document/docs/docs/data-structure/emoji
346        '''
347        if not block_id:
348            block_id = document_id
349        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
350        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
351        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
352        payload = {
353            "index": insert_index,
354            "children": [
355                {
356                    "block_type": 19,
357                    'callout': {
358                        "background_color": background_color, 
359                        "border_color": border_color,
360                        "text_color": text_color,
361                        'emoji_id':emoji,
362                    }
363                }
364            ]
365        }
366        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
367        bid, cid = resp['data']['children'][0]['block_id'], resp['data']['children'][0]['children'][0]
368        # 限制api请求频率
369        time.sleep(0.1)
370        return bid, cid
371    
372
373    def updateblockimage(self, document_id:str, block_id:str, image_token=None, img_property:dict={}, access_token=None):
374        '''
375        img_property:
376            width:
377                图片宽度，单位像素（px）
378            height:
379                图片高度，单位像素（px）
380            align:
381                对齐方式
382                可选值有：
383                1：居左排版
384                2：居中排版
385                3：居右排版
386        '''
387        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}'
388        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
389        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
390        payload = {
391            'replace_image':{
392                "token":image_token,
393                "width":img_property.get('width', None),
394                "height":img_property.get('height', None),
395                "align":img_property.get('align', None),
396            }
397        }
398        resp = request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
399        # 限制接口频率
400        time.sleep(0.34)
401        return resp
402
403    def add_permissions(self, document_id, member_id, permission='full_access', member_type='openchat', notify=False, check=True, access_token=None):
404        '''
405        member_id:
406            协作者 ID，与协作者 ID 类型需要对应
407        memeber_type:
408            email：飞书邮箱
409            openid：开放平台 ID
410            unionid：开放平台 UnionID
411            openchat：开放平台群组 ID
412            opendepartmentid：开放平台部门 ID。仅当使用 user_access_token 调用时有效
413            userid：用户自定义 ID
414            groupid：自定义用户组 ID
415            wikispaceid：知识空间 ID
416        permission:
417            view：可阅读角色
418            edit：可编辑角色
419            full_access：可管理角色
420        '''
421        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/drive/v1/permissions/{document_id}/members?need_notification={notify}&type=docx'
422        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
423        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
424        tmap = {"email":"user", "openchat":"chat"}
425        payload = {
426            "member_id": member_id,
427            "member_type": member_type,
428            "perm": permission,
429            "perm_type": "container",
430            "type": tmap.get(member_type, 'user'),
431        }
432        resp = None
433        try:
434            resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
435        except Exception as e:
436            if check:raise Exception(e)
437            else:print(e)
438        return resp
439
440    def upload_image(self, block_id, file_path, access_token=None):
441        file_path = os.path.abspath(file_path)
442        file_size = os.path.getsize(file_path)
443        url = self._host + f"open-apis/drive/v1/medias/upload_all"
444        form = {
445            'file_name': os.path.basename(file_path),
446            'parent_type': 'docx_image',
447            'parent_node': block_id,
448            'size': str(file_size),
449            'file': (open(file_path, 'rb'))
450        }  
451        multi_form = MultipartEncoder(form)
452        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
453        headers = {'Content-Type': multi_form.content_type, 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
454        response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=multi_form)
455        resp = {}
456        if bool(response.text) and response.text[0] == '{':
457            resp = response.json()
458        else:
459            pass
460        code = resp.get("code", -1)
461        if code == -1:
462            code = resp.get("StatusCode", -1)
463        if code == -1 and response.status_code != 200:
464            response.raise_for_status()
465        if code != 0:
466            raise LarkException(code=code, msg=resp.get("msg", ""))
467        token = None
468        if resp['code'] == 0:
469            token = resp['data']['file_token']
470        # 限制接口频率
471        time.sleep(0.34)
472        return token
473    
474    def delete_children_blocks(self, document_id, index_range, block_id=None, access_token=None):
475        '''
476        :param index_range:
477            删除的索引，下标从1开始，支持 Int | List
478            示例:
479                删除子块序列1到3
480                index_range=[1, 3]
481                删除子块1
482                index_range=1
483        '''
484        if not block_id:
485            block_id = document_id
486        if not isinstance(index_range, Iterable):
487            index_range = [index_range] * 2
488        if any([index <= 0 for index in index_range]):
489            raise ValueError('下标从1开始')
490        url = self._host + f'open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children/batch_delete'
491        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
492        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
493        payload = {
494            'start_index':min(index_range)-1,
495            'end_index':max(index_range),
496        }
497        resp = request("DELETE", url, headers, payload)
498        # 限制接口频率
499        time.sleep(0.34)
500        return resp
501
502    def insert_image(self, document_id, image_path, block_id=None, replace=False):
503        if not os.path.exists(image_path):
504            print('image path not exists!')
505            return
506        img_block_id = self.createblocks(document_id, block(None, 27), block_id=block_id)[-1]
507        if replace:
508            self.delete_children_blocks(document_id, 1, block_id)
509        image_token = self.upload_image(img_block_id, image_path)
510        return self.updateblockimage(document_id, img_block_id, image_token)
511    
512    ############################### SHEET API ######################################
513
514    def update_permission(self, file_token, file_type="sheet"):
515        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/permissions/{file_token}/public?type={file_type}"
516        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
517        payload = {"link_share_entity": "tenant_editable"}
518        resp = request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
519        return resp['data']
520
521    def find_cell(self, spreadsheet_token, sheet_id, find_str):
522        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v3/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/sheets/{sheet_id}/find"
523        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
524        payload = {"find_condition": {"range": sheet_id + "!A:E", "match_case": False, "match_entire_cell": False,
525                                      "search_by_regex": False, "include_formulas": False}, "find": find_str}
526        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
527        return resp['data']
528
529    def get_values_batch(self, spreadsheet_token, ranges, value_render="Formula"):
530        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/values_batch_get?" f"ranges={ranges}&valueRenderOption={value_render}"
531        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
532        payload = {"ranges": ranges, "valueRenderOption": "Formula"}
533        resp = request("GET", url, headers, payload)
534        return resp['data']
535
536    def update_values(self, spreadsheet_token, crange, values):
537        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/values"
538        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
539        payload = {"valueRange": {"range": crange, "values": values}}
540        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, payload)
541        return resp['data']
542
543    def set_cell_style(self, spreadsheet_token, crange, foreColor=None, backColor=None):
544        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/style"
545        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
546        style = {"formatter": "@", "vAlign": 1, "hAlign": 1, "foreColor": foreColor, "backColor": backColor}
547        payload = {"appendStyle": {"range": crange, "style": style}}
548        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, payload)
549        return resp['data']
550    
551    def batch_set_cell_style(self, spreadsheet_token, styles):
552        """
553        批量设置单元格样式，样式字典参考：https://open.feishu.cn/document/server-docs/docs/sheets-v3/data-operation/batch-set-cell-style#1b8abd5d
554        """
555        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/styles_batch_update"
556        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
557        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, {"data": styles})
558        return resp['data']
559
560    def insert_cell_image(self, spreadsheet_token, image_data):
561        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/%s/values_image" % spreadsheet_token
562        headers = {'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
563        payload = {"range": image_data[0], "image": image_data[1], "name": image_data[2]}
564        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
565        return resp['data']
566
567    def merge_cells(self, spreadsheet_token, crange):
568        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/%s/merge_cells" % spreadsheet_token
569        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
570        payload = {"range": crange, "mergeType": "MERGE_ALL"}
571        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
572        return resp['data']
573
574    def create_spreadsheet(self, foldertoken, title):
575        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v3/spreadsheets"
576        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
577        payload = {"title": title, "folder_token": foldertoken}
578        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
579        return resp['data']['spreadsheet']['spreadsheet_token'], resp['data']['spreadsheet']['url']

581    def get_first_sheetid(self, spreadsheet_token):
582        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/" + spreadsheet_token + "/metainfo"
583        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
584        resp = request("GET", url, headers)
585        return resp['data']['sheets'][0]["sheetId"]

587    def get_sheets_info(self, spreadsheet_token):
588        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/" + spreadsheet_token + "/metainfo"
589        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
590        resp = request("GET", url, headers)
591        return resp['data']['sheets']

593    def set_dimension_properties(self, spreadsheet_token, dimension_set):
594        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/" + spreadsheet_token + "/dimension_range"
595        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
596        payload = {
597            "dimension":{
598                "sheetId":dimension_set['sheetId'],
599                "majorDimension":dimension_set['majorDimension'],
600                "startIndex":dimension_set['startIndex'],
601                "endIndex":dimension_set['endIndex']
602            },
603            "dimensionProperties":{
604                "visible":'true',
605                "fixedSize":dimension_set['fixedSize']
606            }
607        }
608        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, payload)
609        return resp['data']
610
611    def sheets_batch_update(self, spreadsheet_token, sheetid):
612        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/%s/sheets_batch_update" % spreadsheet_token
613        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
614        payload = {"requests": [
615            {"updateSheet": {"properties": {"sheetId": sheetid, "frozenColCount": 0, "frozenRowCount": 1}}}]}
616        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
617        return resp['data']

619    def media_download_image(self, file_token):
620        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/medias/{file_token}/download"
621        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
622        response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10)
623        response.raise_for_status()
624        cl = response.content
625        return cl
626
627    def upload_file_to_drive(self, file_path, parent_node=None, file_name=None):
628        prepare_url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/files/upload_prepare"
629        part_url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/files/upload_part"
630        finish_url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/files/upload_finish"
631        if file_name is None:
632            file_name = os.path.basename(file_path)
633        part_size = 4194304
634        if parent_node is None:
635            parent_node = 'XKh7fHoDYlFprOdkcEQcgAuHnLh'
636
637        def cal_file_block(local_path):
638            result = []
639            with open(local_path, 'rb') as f:
640                index = 0
641                while True:
642                    chunk = f.read(part_size)
643                    if not chunk:
644                        break
645                    result.append(chunk)
646                    index += 1
647            return result
648
649        file_stat = os.stat(file_path)
650        payload = {'file_name': file_name, 'parent_type': 'explorer', 'parent_node': parent_node,
651                   'size': str(file_stat.st_size)}
652        headers = {'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
653        result = request("POST", prepare_url, headers=headers, data=payload)
654        upload_id = result['data']['upload_id']
655        block_num = result['data']['block_num']
656        block_size = result['data']['block_size']
657        blocks = cal_file_block(file_path)
658        for index, block in enumerate(blocks):
659            payload = {'upload_id': upload_id, 'seq': str(index), 'size': str(len(block)), 'file': block}
660            multi_form = MultipartEncoder(payload)
661            part_headers = headers.copy()
662            part_headers['Content-Type'] = multi_form.content_type
663            response = request("POST", part_url, part_headers, data=multi_form)
664        finish_payload = {'upload_id': upload_id, 'block_num': block_num}
665        response = request("POST", finish_url, headers, data=finish_payload)
666        return response['data']
667
668    def add_work_sheet(self, spreadsheet_token, title, index=0):
669        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/sheets_batch_update"
670        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
671        payload = {"requests": [{"addSheet": {"properties": {"title": title, "index": index}}}]}
672        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
673        return resp['data']
674    
675
676
677    def create_numbered_headings(self, document_id: str, titles: list, 
678                                heading_level: int = 1, parent_block_id: str = None,
679                                bold: bool = True, access_token = None):
680        '''
681        插入带编号的标题块（支持heading1/heading2，自动显示在导航栏）
682        :param document_id: 文档ID
683        :param titles: 标题列表，如['第一章 概述', ...]
684        :param heading_level: 标题级别，1表示heading1，2表示heading2
685        :param parent_block_id: 父块ID（不传为根节点）
686        :param bold: 是否加粗
687        :param access_token: 访问令牌
688        :return: 插入的block节点列表
689        '''
690        # 验证标题级别
691        if heading_level not in [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]:
692            raise ValueError("heading_level must be 1、2、3、4、5")
693        
694        host = self._host
695        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
696        parent_block_id = parent_block_id or document_id  # 根节点默认为文档ID
697        url = f"{host}/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{parent_block_id}/children"
698        headers = {
699            "Content-Type": "application/json; charset=utf-8",
700            "Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token}"
701        }
702        
703        children = []
704        for idx, title in enumerate(titles, 1):
705            # 根据标题级别设置block_type和对应字段
706            block_type = 3 if heading_level == 1 else 4
707            heading_field = "heading1" if heading_level == 1 else "heading2"
708            
709            children.append({
710                "block_type": block_type,
711                heading_field: {
712                    "elements": [
713                        {
714                            "text_run": {
715                                "content": f"{idx}. {title}",
716                                "text_element_style": {
717                                    "bold": bold
718                                }
719                            }
720                        }
721                    ]
722                }
723            })
724        
725        payload = {
726            "index": -1,
727            "children": children
728        }
729        
730        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
731        return resp['data']['children']
